channel.title: Need a expert ot help me
channel.description:
ive had an idear im using Dynasty server and every time someone dies why respawn but has 0 hp and still are bent over i thought about adding this.
} if (deadtimer == 4 && currentHealth = 0) {
so if they are dead and have no health somthing happen but what should i add to refesh there acount to normal. any idears would be helpful.

just put like

currentHealth += method for getting their hitpoints level
